aviatorcomeguadagnor: After placing the bet, the user must wait for the plane symbol to reach height. The user must cash out the money before the game symbol reaches height and disappears from the game screen. In case the symbol disappears before pressing the cash out button, the player loses the stake amount. When the automatic cash out feature is used, money is cashed out when the index exceeds the selected amount by 0.01. Example if you choose 2.0X index, you will cash out and bet automatically at 2.01X.

descrlint: For your deposits with Orange Money Burkina, dial * 144 * 4 * 6 * montant# on your mobile to get an OTP code.
